title: Bronze 5 JG/SUP/TOP looking for coach !
body:
My ign is S1LAS and am looking for a coach. Play most evenings if not every evening. 
Will reward in some monetary form or skins if requested based on development

replies.body:
As long as he is playing on his own account and is in relevant tiers to queue with somebody it's perfectly fine. If he gets too high he will fall back down like Icarus and his wax wings

But here all he is doing is asking for coaching and offering rewards, I know he did post previously for people to play and carry him

I said this before on a post you did yesterday.
Asking someone to "Carry" - "Boost" you is against Riots rules.

I've already posted what you can do to improve in other ways.
